reviewText: Anytime Oliver Samuels is playing, I recommend you stop what your doing and take it in!  That's only if you want none stop laughter.

If you are thinking about buying this item from "jamanzie", forget about it. They will send you the wrong item, blame Amazon.com, and then ask you to do the work of sending the item back to them.  Do Not Buy from this seller.
Good story-line. I have never watched anything with Oliver that was not good... Need I say more?
This is Oliver at its best you can be sure that if you purchase anything by this collection you will really enjoy laughing. Well done

Oliver is awesome.  The video quality of this dvd was wonderful compared to other Oliver dvds I have gotten. However, the one I got is different from the picture Amazon shows. I got Oliver - Jamrock Hotel and The Legacy DVD (Volume 2).
